original_title: The King: The Story of Denis Law
overview: Denis Law was a phenomenal football player and entertainer, who, together with Bobby Charlton and George Best swept Manchester United to the top of the domestic League and European greatness. In fact, this wee Scot was so good that Pel√© once famously said he was the only Brit good enough to play for Brazil!
title: The King: The Story of Denis Law
